title: Github project management utility functions
text: R package Github project management utility functions

text: gq GraphQL connection object `get_gq()` project_id Project ID issue_id Issue ID verbose Print GraphQL query; default=FALSE

title: Add Issue to Github Project — add_project_issue
Add Issue to Github Project — add_project_issue
code: if (FALSE) {  token <- Sys.getenv("GITHUB_TOKEN")  gq <- get_gq(token)  prj <- get_project_id(gq, owner = "MarineSensitivities", num = 1)  #TODO: get issues from repository }

title: Get GraphQL connection — get_gq
text: Get GraphQL connection Github. Refresh schema returning.

title: Get GraphQL connection — get_gq
text: token Github personal access token. See Authenticating GraphQL. url GraphQL API URL. Default https://api.github.com/graphql

title: Get GraphQL connection — get_gq
code: if (FALSE) {   token <- Sys.getenv("GITHUB_TOKEN")   gq <- get_gq(token)   gq }

what: Get repositories for a Github user or organization — get_owner_repos
title: Get repositories for a Github user or organization — get_owner_repos

Get Github Project ID — get_project_id
text: gq GraphQL connection object `get_gq()` owner Github user organization name containing Project project_num Project number

title: Get Github Project ID — get_project_id
code: if (FALSE) {   token <- Sys.getenv("GITHUB_TOKEN")   gq <- get_gq(token)   get_project_id(gq, owner = "MarineSensitivities", num = 1) }

title: Get Project Issues — get_project_issues
text: gq GraphQL connection object `get_gq()` project_id Project ID `get_project_id()`

title: Get Project Issues — get_project_issues
text: Character vector issue node IDs, titles names

title: Get Project Issues — get_project_issues
code: if (FALSE) {  token <- Sys.getenv("GITHUB_TOKEN")  gq <- get_gq(token)  prj <- get_project_id(gq, owner = "MarineSensitivities", num = 1)  get_project_issues(gq, prj) }

what: Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
title: Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
text: owner Github user organization name containing issues repo Github repository name

title: Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
Get Issues from Github repository — get_repo_issues
Glue with brackets — glueb
text: Since GraphQL statements heavily use curly braces ``, function wrapper around glue make easier write GraphQL statements.

title: ghmgt 0.2.0
text: Added functions: add_project_issue(), get_project_issues(), get_repo_issues(). Removed hello().

title: ghmgt 0.1.0
text: Initial package functions: get_gq(), get_owner_repos(), get_project_id(), glueb().
